description.english: Complete the Labyrinth in a non-Hardcore league.
description.tchinese: 在標準模式中完成帝王迷宮。

description.english: Complete the Cruel Labyrinth in a non-Hardcore league.
description.tchinese: 在標準模式中完成殘酷帝王迷宮。

description.english: Complete the Merciless Labyrinth in a non-Hardcore league.
description.tchinese: 在標準模式中完成無情帝王迷宮。

description.english: Finish the Labyrinth in a Hardcore League.
description.tchinese: 在專家模式中完成帝王迷宮。

description.english: Finish the Cruel Labyrinth in a Hardcore League.
description.tchinese: 在專家模式中完成殘酷帝王迷宮。

description.english: Finish Merciless Labyrinth in a Hardcore League.
description.tchinese: 在專家模式中完成無情帝王迷宮。

description.english: Kill Brutus, Warden of Axiom Prison.
description.tchinese: 殺死典獄長布魯特斯。

description.english: Kill Merveil, the Siren.
description.tchinese: 殺死海妖莫薇兒。

description.english: Vanquish the Vaal Oversoul.
description.tchinese: 征服瓦爾超靈。

description.english: Defeat Piety in her laboratory.
description.tchinese: 在實驗室打倒派蒂。

description.english: Kill Dominus as the Ranger.
description.tchinese: 使用遊俠殺死神主。

description.english: Kill Dominus as the Templar.
description.tchinese: 使用聖騎士殺死神主。

description.english: Kill Dominus as the Witch.
description.tchinese: 使用女巫殺死神主。

description.english: Kill Dominus as the Shadow.
description.tchinese: 使用暗影刺客殺死神主。

description.english: Kill Dominus as the Duelist.
description.tchinese: 使用決鬥者殺死神主。

description.english: Kill Dominus as the Marauder.
description.tchinese: 使用野蠻人殺死神主。

description.english: Kill Dominus as the Scion.
description.tchinese: 使用貴族殺死神主。

description.english: Free the Scion.
description.tchinese: 解救貴族。

description.english: Reach level 60 as a non-Hardcore character.
description.tchinese: 在非專家模式中角色達到 60 級。

description.english: Reach level 70 as a non-Hardcore character.
description.tchinese: 在非專家模式中角色達到 70 級。

description.english: Reach level 80 as a non-Hardcore character.
description.tchinese: 在非專家模式中角色達到 80 級。

description.english: Reach level 90 as a non-Hardcore character.
description.tchinese: 在非專家模式中角色達到 90 級。

description.english: Reach level 60 as a Hardcore character.
description.tchinese: 在專家模式中角色達到 60 級。

description.english: Reach level 70 as a Hardcore character.
description.tchinese: 在專家模式中角色達到 70 級。

description.english: Reach level 80 as a Hardcore character.
description.tchinese: 在專家模式中角色達到 80 級。

description.english: Reach level 90 as a Hardcore character.
description.tchinese: 在專家模式中角色達到 90 級。

description.english: Tag each waypoint.
description.tchinese: 開啟各個傳送點。

description.english: Complete each side-quest.
description.tchinese: 完成各個非主線任務。

description.english: Listen to all optional NPC dialogue.
description.tchinese: 聽完所有 NPC 的非必要對話內容。

description.english: Discover all environmental lore.
description.tchinese: 發現所有的荒野傳說。

description.english: Create a Unique item using an Orb of Chance.
description.tchinese: 使用機會石點出一件傳奇裝備。

description.english: Create an item with six linked sockets using an Orb of Fusing.
description.tchinese: 使用鏈結石點出一件六連裝備。

description.english: Have a Skill Gem reach level 20.
description.tchinese: 將一個技能寶石提升到 20 等級。

description.english: Have 15 combined Endurance, Frenzy, and Power Charges active simultaneously.
description.tchinese: 同一時間身上帶有總計 15 個能量球，包含耐力、狂怒、暴擊能量球皆可。

description.english: Slay an enemy that is simultaneously Ignited, Shocked, and Frozen.
description.tchinese: 在一個敵人同時被點燃、感電且冰凍的狀態下擊殺它。

description.english: Equip a Rare or Unique item in every non-Flask slot.
description.tchinese: 全身上下除了藥水之外的所有欄位皆裝備一件稀有或傳奇裝備。

description.english: Shatter 5 monsters with a single action.
description.tchinese: 一擊粉碎五隻以上的怪物。

description.english: Equip a Unique item.
description.tchinese: 裝備一件傳奇裝備。

description.english: Allocate a Keystone Passive Skill.
description.tchinese: 點選一個關鍵天賦。

description.english: Fully clear an end-game Map area.
description.tchinese: 完全清空一張異界地圖內的怪物。

description.english: Help all three Bandit Lords.
description.tchinese: 幫助各個盜賊頭目。

description.english: Open a Large Chest.
description.tchinese: 開啟一個大寶箱。

description.english: Have 3 Totems alive at one time.
description.tchinese: 同時召喚三個以上的圖騰。

description.english: Reach level 8 in any Race Event.
description.tchinese: 在任意比賽模式中達到等級 8 。

description.english: Capture a flag during any CTF match.
description.tchinese: 在任何一場 CTF 對局中，搶下一面旗幟。

description.english: Have 9 Raised Zombies alive at one time.
description.tchinese: 同時召喚九隻以上的殭屍。

description.english: Have at least 75% resistance to Fire, Ice and Lightning.
description.tchinese: 火焰、冰霜、閃電三種元素抗性都達到至少 75%。

description.english: Have a Unique Map drop within a Unique Map.
description.tchinese: 在一張傳奇地圖中掉落另一張傳奇地圖。

description.english: Have a Unique Item drop in the Twilight Strand.
description.tchinese: 在絕望岩灘上打到一件傳奇物品。

description.english: Fully clear the Dread Thicket
description.tchinese: 完全清除驚魂樹洞區域的怪物

description.english: Allocate a character's fourth Keystone Passive.
description.tchinese: 一個角色點取四個關鍵天賦點。

description.english: Fully clear the Catacombs.
description.tchinese: 完全清除黑石陵墓區域的怪物。

description.english: Have at least 90% resistance to any Element.
description.tchinese: 任意一種元素抗性達到至少 90%。

description.english: Fully clear the Archives.
description.tchinese: 完全清除檔案室區域的怪物。

description.english: Join a public party.
description.tchinese: 加入一個公開隊伍。

description.english: Fully clear the Ship Graveyard Cave.
description.tchinese: 完全清除魅影船墓洞穴區域的怪物。

description.english: Have a Vaal Skill Gem reach level 20.
description.tchinese: 將一個瓦爾技能寶石提升到 20 等級。

description.english: Corrupt an item to have a white socket.
description.tchinese: 腐化一件裝備使其擁有白色插槽。

description.english: Have 60 Minions at the same time.
description.tchinese: 同時擁有 60 個以上的召喚物。

description.english: Corrupt a map to have eight mods.
description.tchinese: 腐化一個地圖並使其具有八項以上屬性。

description.english: Kill another player in any mode or league.
description.tchinese: 在割喉聯盟中擊殺一名玩家。

description.english: Corrupt a map into a Vaal Temple map.
description.tchinese: 腐化一張地圖使其地形變為瓦爾密殿。

description.english: Corrupt a skill gem into a Vaal skill gem.
description.tchinese: 腐化一顆寶石使其成為瓦爾寶石。

description.english: Enhance a map with a Vaal fragment.
description.tchinese: 將一個瓦爾地圖碎片與異界地圖一起使用。

description.english: Corrupt an item to have a new implicit mod.
description.tchinese: 腐化一項物品並使其擁有特殊固定屬性。

description.english: Fully clear the Apex of Sacrifice.
description.tchinese: 完全清空生贄之尖。

description.english: Fully clear the Colosseum end-game Map.
description.tchinese: 將遊戲最後的大決鬥場地圖完全清空。

description.english: Fully clear The Harvest.
description.tchinese: 將育靈之室完全清空。

description.english: Kill Voll, Emperor of Purity.
description.tchinese: 殺死帝王福爾。

description.english: Kill Shavronne of Umbra.
description.tchinese: 殺死烏姆布拉的薛朗。

description.english: Kill Doedre Darktongue.
description.tchinese: 殺死禁忌祭者德瑞。

description.english: Kill Maligaro, The Inquisitor.
description.tchinese: 殺死審判者馬雷葛蘿。

description.english: Kill the Eater of Souls in the Core end-game Map.
description.tchinese: 在遊戲最後的核心地圖中殺死食魂者。

description.english: Hand in a Full Set of Divination Cards to Tasuni.
description.tchinese: 將一整套命運卡交給達蘇尼。

description.english: Kill Malachai, The Nightmare.
description.tchinese: 以所有職業殺死瑪拉凱。

description.english: Reserve 95% or more of your Life.
description.tchinese: 生命保留你 95% 的生命值。

description.english: Land the killing blow on the Vaal Oversoul while you have the Fortify Buff active.
description.tchinese: 在你身上有護體增益效果時殺死瓦爾超靈。

description.english: Kill a Rogue Exile in Kaom's Stronghold.
description.tchinese: 在岡姆的堡壘擊殺一個野生的流亡者。

description.english: Land the killing blow on the Burning Man while you are burning.
description.tchinese: 在燃燒的狀態下給予燃燒者最後一擊。

description.english: Open a Vaal Vessel in a corrupted zone.
description.tchinese: 在被汙染的區域中開啟一個瓦爾容器。

description.english: Equip each Maraketh Weapon type.
description.tchinese: 裝備過所有種類的馬拉克斯武器。

description.english: Craft a Jewel with four mods using an Orb of Alchemy.
description.tchinese: 用點金石做出擁有 4 個詞綴的珠寶。

description.english: Corrupt a Unique Jewel into a different Unique Jewel.
description.tchinese: 汙染一個傳奇珠寶使其成為另一種傳奇珠寶。

description.english: Equip a Unique Jewel with a radius.
description.tchinese: 鑲嵌一個對天賦樹有範圍影響的傳奇珠寶。

description.english: Defeat The Elder.
description.tchinese: 擊敗異界尊師。

description.english: Complete Part 1.
description.tchinese: 完成第一部曲。

description.english: Kill Tsoagoth, the Brine King
description.tchinese: 擊殺海洋之王賽根斯。

description.english: Kill Arakaali, Spinner of Shadows.
description.tchinese: 擊殺闇影鬼蛛艾爾卡莉。

description.english: Kill both Lunaris and Solaris in the same encounter.
description.tchinese: 同時擊殺日耀神與月影神。

description.english: Kill the Depraved Trinity.
description.tchinese: 擊殺墮道三巨頭。

description.english: Complete Part 2.
description.tchinese: 完成第二部曲。

description.english: Have a Voidstone socketed in your Atlas.
description.tchinese: 放置 1 顆虛空石至你的輿圖上。

description.english: Have two Voidstones socketed in your Atlas.
description.tchinese: 放置 2 顆虛空石至你的輿圖上。

description.english: Have three Voidstones socketed in your Atlas.
description.tchinese: 放置 3 顆虛空石至你的輿圖上。

description.english: Complete every map on the Atlas.
description.tchinese: 完成異界輿圖上所有地圖。

description.english: Complete the Hall of Grandmasters.
description.tchinese: 完成元帥殿堂。

description.english: Kill Atziri in the Alluring Abyss.
description.tchinese: 擊殺位於誘人深淵的阿茲里。

description.english: Complete a Red or Purple Tier Map with a Horned Scarab applied.
description.tchinese: 完成一張套用了犄角聖甲蟲的紅色或紫色階級地圖。

description.english: Kill every Breachlord.
description.tchinese: 擊殺所有裂痕領主。

description.english: Choose an Ascendancy class.
description.tchinese: 完成昇華職業。

description.english: Complete the Vinktar Square
description.tchinese: 完成維克塔廣場。

description.english: Kill the Shaper.
description.tchinese: 擊殺塑界者。

description.english: Complete the Eternal Labyrinth in a non-Hardcore league.
description.tchinese: 在標準模式中完成永恆帝王迷宮。

description.english: Complete the Eternal Labyrinth in a Hardcore League.
description.tchinese: 在專家模式中完成永恆帝王迷宮。

description.english: Kill High Templar Dominus.
description.tchinese: 擊殺神主。

description.english: Kill Argus.
description.tchinese: 擊殺阿格斯。

description.english: Kill Izaro and have him drop 3 treasure keys.
description.tchinese: 擊殺伊澤洛並且掉落 3 把古銅鑰匙。

description.english: Kill a god and obtain their power.
description.tchinese: 擊殺任一神並且獲得祂的神之力。

description.english: Equip two unique items with the same name.
description.tchinese: 裝備兩件一樣名稱的傳奇裝備。

description.english: Complete a map area that is affected by 10 or more mods. This can include mods from Sextants and other mods that are not on the map item.
description.tchinese: 完成擁有超過 10 條詞綴的地圖。可透過六分儀或其他道具來增加地圖詞綴。

description.english: Open a map in the map device and step through its portal.
description.tchinese: 透過地圖裝置開啟輿圖並且進入。

description.english: Kill Beidat, Archangel of Death.
description.tchinese: 擊殺死亡天使．貝達特。

description.english: Complete a Master's Atlas Objective.
description.tchinese: 完成大師的輿圖任務。

description.english: Defeat each Master's most dangerous foe.
description.tchinese: 擊敗每位大師最危險的敵人。

description.english: Obtain every Pantheon power.
description.tchinese: 獲得眾神殿的所有神之力。

description.english: Fully upgrade every god power.
description.tchinese: 將所有神之力完全升級。

description.english: Corrupt an Essence monster with a Remnant of Corruption.
description.tchinese: 使用遺忘的污染器皿汙染精髓怪物。

description.english: Kill a monster that is under the influence of five Essence mods.
description.tchinese: 擊殺擁有 5 個精髓的怪物。

description.english: Kill all Warbands leaders.
description.tchinese: 擊殺所有軍團首領。

description.english: Use an orb to change the mods of a Strongbox.
description.tchinese: 使用通貨改變保險箱的詞綴。

description.english: Have four Voidstones socketed in your Atlas.
description.tchinese: 放置 4 顆虛空石至你的輿圖上。

description.english: Defeat Sirus, Awakener of Worlds.
description.tchinese: 擊敗喚世者．賽勒斯。.

description.english: Accept The Maven's Invitation and defeat The Maven.
description.tchinese: 接受釋界的邀請並擊敗釋界。

description.english: Defeat The Black Star
description.tchinese: 擊敗黯星

description.english: Defeat The Infinite Hunger
description.tchinese: 擊敗無盡渴望

description.english: Defeat The Searing Exarch
description.tchinese: 擊敗灼烙總督

description.english: Defeat The Eater of Worlds
description.tchinese: 擊敗吞噬天地
